# Vince Canger

> Software Engineer @ Wasp. Building developer tools in Berlin.

## Links

- GitHub: https://github.com/vincanger

## Projects

- Open SaaS (https://opensaas.sh) - Free, open-source SaaS starter with Wasp
- CoverLetterGPT (https://coverlettergpt.xyz) - Generate cover letters from job descriptions
- Banger Tweet Bot - Personal Twitter brainstorming agent
- Stargazer - Celebrate GitHub milestones with videos of stargazers

## About

Full-stack web dev, developer tools, technical writing.
Previously: Web3, freelance, music production.
